article_text:
Despite ACA, doctor says need for reform remains

Says Medicare could expand to all ages

Free talk is 6 p.m. Thursday at Myers Park Baptist

article_metadata.news-keywords: Charlotte, Dr. Andy Coates, single payer, Physicians for a National Health Plan
article_metadata.description: Dr. Andrew Coates agrees with some critics of the Affordable Care Act. In many ways, he says the federal law “reinforced or worsened some of the most egregious inequalities and injustices in the health system.”
article_metadata.title: Charlotte doctors host advocate of Medicare for all | The Charlotte Observer
